entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mono builds failing with file not found error #103677
  • browser-wasm LibraryTests timing out #103674
  • Arm64/Sve cleanup: Use `gtNewSimdCvtMaskToVectorNode` from gtFoldExprHWIntrinsic instead of importer #103672
  • Extend System.Guid with a new creation API for v7 #103658
    9.0.0
  • Issue with COM Interop in VB6 After Migrating from .NET 4.8 to .NET 8 #103656
  • Is the locking in ReflectionComposablePart correct? #103650
  • CurrencyNegativePattern is set to 1(instead of 0) when getting "en-US" culture in .NET 8. #103644
  • [WPF] System.Management 8.0.0 - Scrolling using stylus does not work anymore when using ManagementClass.GetInstances() #103640
  • System.IO.Tests.Directory_Create_Tests.FileSystemWatcher_Directory_Create_InNestedDirectory fails with "Created event did not occur as expected" #103630
  • [ios-8.0/9.0] Cannot compile project with AOT enabled (Assertion at mini-llvm.c, condition `cinfo->ret.nslots == 1' not met) #103628
  • Current status of .NET support on HarmonyOS platform #103627
  • [browser][publish] Windows has problems with AOT build/publish for long paths #103625
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 7 Regressions on 6/15/2024 2:08:36 PM #103652
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 26 Regressions on 6/14/2024 3:42:32 AM #103653
  • Test failure: CoreMangLib/system/span/RefStructWithSpan/RefStructWithSpan.cmd #103624
  • [wasm] System.Security.Cryptography.Tests: Unable to evaluate script: tab crashed #103623
  • Tensor<T> and supporting types, part 2 #103611
    9.0.0

Closed

  • `OrderedDictionary.SetAt` bug #103637
    9.0.0
  • CecilPackageVersionMatchesAssemblyVersion failing #103563
  • Ability to obsolete `IEnumerable.GetEnumerator` used through Linq #103664
  • Arm64/Sve: AV in GatherLoad* APIs #103606
  • Arm64: Rename AdvSimd/Sve Load/Store vector API names #102340
    9.0.0
  • net7.0-ios16.1 depends on non-existent Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Ref 7.0.20 #102214
  • Crash in DoStackSnapshot. #95167
    9.0.0
  • Proposal: use ValueTask<TItem> in CacheExtensions.GetOrCreateAsync #103666
  • Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable does not support setting empty values #50554
    Future
  • 'ProcessStartInfo.EnvironmentVariables ["FOO"] = null' launches with empty environment variable #34446
    Future
  • Unable to debug crash dump created on machine using Ubuntu 22.04 feed runtime. #103377
    9.0.0
  • XDocument.Load fails with certain Unicode characters (U+E039) #103532
  • IBinaryInteger<BigInteger>.GetShortestBitLength() - int overflow is not handled #84670
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.DynamicChainTests.PolicyConstraints_Valid #103615
  • System.Numerics.Tests.Vector3Tests.Vector3LerpTest1 on arm64 #103568
  • AdvSimd: Invalid "The constant does not fit within the value bounds of '0' to '15'" warning #103556
  • Test failure: System.Numerics.Tests.Vector3Tests.Vector3MultiplyOperatorTest #103544
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Move the default property settings that were used to build the runtime pack, to `wasm-props.json` included in the runtime pack #91628
    9.0.0
  • AllSubsets_Mono_Minijit_RuntimeTests minijit fails to build with "Could not copy the file hostfxr.dll.pdb because it was not found" #103642
  • [6.0] Error 12175 calling WINHTTP_CALLBACK_STATUS_REQUEST_ERROR, 'A security error occurred' #95155
    9.0.0
  • any limitations on EventCounters on Linux? #102629
    9.0.0
  • Unoptimal codegen for "obj is T" with T being struct/sealed #36649
    Future
  • Consider switching to LLVM libunwind #4193
  • [API Proposal]: Add API to detect Binary Format (MS-NRBF) header #84090
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] WinHttpHandler #56957
    Future
  • [wasm][chrome] Unable to evaluate script: disconnected: unable to send message to renderer #103061
  • Wasm test failure: Unable to evaluate script: target frame detached #102957
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Clone for IncrementalHash and KMAC #103170
    9.0.0
  • [iOS/HybridGlobalization] No space between time and AM/PM designator #102250
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] map `QuicException` to `OCE` in case of a cancellation #98220
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690.cmd #103613
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690.cmd #103614
  • mac m1 build failure #92860
  • Initialize Job - ComponentGovernanceComponentDetection - Unable to locate dotnet on build agent, tool failed to execute #90716
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 28 Regressions on 7/18/2023 1:13:00 AM #89259
  • [7.0] jit-dasm failed with error MSB3971 #95161
  • Component governance failing on musl legs of servicing branches #85492
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 7 Regressions on 5/12/2023 4:02:48 AM #87180
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 29 Regressions on 1/27/2023 11:43:56 PM #81549
  • Support running perf benchmarks from `dotnet/performance` on a PR, and compare with a baseline #76533
  • [release/6.0] CI failure: Banana RID not found in dev-innerloop (sourcebuild) #78197
  • [Build] Console output lost #97211
  • error C3611: 'System::Numerics::INumberBase::System::IUtf8SpanFormattable.Try Format': a sealed function cannot have a pure-specifier #97036
  • Dead lettering tests #101524
  • AOT warnings reported on partial classes #102893

PullRequests

Created

  • Generalize IControlFlowGraph successors #103676
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ReciprocalEstimate`, `ReciprocalExponent`, `ReciprocalSqrtEstimate`, `ReciprocalSqrtStep`, and `ReciprocalStep` #103673
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Handle possible null in SerialStream.Dispose() on Windows #103671
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use Stream.CopyTo{Async} in NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.Append{Async} #103669
    area-System.IO
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetNestedExceptionData #103668
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Consistently report unresolved members in illink #103667
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `Scale` and `Sqrt` #103663
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Find all generic interface impls #103661
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix locking in ReflectionComposablePart.ImportsCache #103660
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Whitespaces in LazyThreadSafetyMode.cs comments #103659
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add notes for NativeAOT specific warnings in ExpectedWarningAttributes #103657
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [Logging.EventSource] Add trace correlation fields #103655
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Have COND_JUMP handling check for gtEffectiveVal #103649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • call gtFoldExpr after fgMorphExpandInstanceField #103648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HybridGlobalization]Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103647
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • CI test #103646
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Add IList<T> and related APIs to JsonObject. #103645
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • bump npm dependencies and lock file format #103639
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Rename StoreVectorMxNAndZip to StoreVectorAndZip #103638
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] change StartsWithPayloadHeader to accept a Span rather than array #103636
    new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix missing 'RelativePath' metadata in items produced by AOT compiler #103633
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NRBF] Reject orphaned records and invalid references #103632
    binary-serialization, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Increase timeout for superpmi-diffs job #103631
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Remove all XunitShowProgress=true #103621
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix print when outputting disasm #103618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Base64Url support for netstandard 2.0 #103617
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • `InlineArray`'s `Equals` and `GetHashCode` throw #103612
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Fix missing hashcode set in OrderedDictionary.SetAt #103643
    area-System.Collections
  • Remove cecil version check #103665
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Arm64/Sve: Remove unwanted insScalableOpts and instructions #103620
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: GatherVectorWithByteOffsets #103564
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Arm AdvSimd: Rename LoadVector128xN to LoadNxVector128 #103626
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Disable ClientDisableTlsResume_Succeeds on Windows #103651
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Support environment variables with empty value #103551
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Use Type.GetProperty/GetField instead of GetMember. #103275
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add System.Formats.Nrbf to the windowsdesktop transport package #103629
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `RoundAwayFromZero`, `RoundToNearest`, `RouteToNegativeInfininty`, `RoundToPositiveInfinity`, `RoundToZero` #103588
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface.GetThreadData #103324
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix 103544 and 103556 #103590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Move hardcoded `_BoolPropertiesThatTriggerRelinking` to `wasm-props.json` included in the runtime pack #103422
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Add exists condition for copying hostfxr & hostpolicy symbol files #103641
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Add support for `SwiftIndirectResult` in Swift calling convention #103570
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Update riscv64 CI image #103616
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Classify stack arguments as single segment #103619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Produce less convoluted IR for boolean `isinst` checks #103391
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Add platform guard to `IsSupported` #103342
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Add support for SwiftSelf<T> in Swift calling convention #103576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HybridGlobalization] Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103226
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-browser
  • JIT: Fix `resolveConflictingDefAndUse` to take kills into account #103562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clone for IncrementalHash and KMAC #103479
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 9.0.0
  • JitDump: RefPosition::getRegisterType() for RegTypeKill segfaults #103573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Wrap Cancelled Request with OCE instead of QuicException #103081
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix DAC getting alloc context for thread #103610
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Test old block layout in outerloop pipelines #103608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup some handling around Avx10v1 #103241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • remove unnecessary Avx512VL ISA flags. #103144
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, avx512
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Create portable box helper and wrap the thread-local alloc context in a struct #103607
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow GC on the first instruction of NoGC region (except in prologs/epilogs) #103540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix 2 issues when triggering a garbage collection via EventPipe #102612
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2476839 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Additional cleanup and acceleration of the System.Numerics vector and related types #103527
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/8.0][Apple] Use NSLocale.preferredLanguages on for default locale name #102748
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix handling SECBUFFER_EXTRA with renegotiation after handshake. #103419
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Arm64: Shuffle(v, [2, 3, 0, 1]) -> ext_64 v,v,1 #103598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Default DynamicCodeSupport to true for CoreCLR #103594
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge 1ES templates #103366
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update EOL versions (main) #103379
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fixing API to use in and ReadOnly as needed #103368
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Gauge Metrics Instrument #103543
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • Expose the useful constant values in TimeSpan #103498
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ConvertToint64` and `ConvertToUInt64` #103502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: Avoid check for returns in methods with pinvokes in LSRA #103559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Backport fix for MethodImpl removal when interfaceImpl is removed #103432
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.x
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [Android] Allow using installed certificates for client authentication in SslStream #103337
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics and add run-time check #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-webpack #103599
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution, javascript
  • JIT: Clean up `RefPosition` "killed registers" storage #103560
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Implement TODO in mono-threads-wasi.S #101337
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [8.0] Disable for August the OOB packages enabled in July #103597
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add user_events support for the native runtime events #102523
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use new ABI classifiers for `GenTreeCall` arguments #103537
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable nullable for HostFactoryResolver.Tests #103609
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
